org.opensocial.explorer.specserver

Class DefaultGadgetSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.DefaultGadgetSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GadgetSpec, JSONSerializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TempGadgetSpec

    public class DefaultGadgetSpec
extends Object
implements GadgetSpec
    Default implementation of GadgetSpec that uses DefaultGadgetResource objects to manage the gadget's resources.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,GadgetResource> getCssResources()
      Returns a Map of GadgetResource objects of type text/css that represents local CSS resources used by the gadget at runtime.

      Returns a GadgetResource of type application/json that represents the EE data model used by this OpenSocial gadget.

      Returns a GadgetResource of type text/xml that represents the XML specification of this OpenSocial gadget.

      Returns a Map of GadgetResource objects of type text/html that represents local HTML resources used by the gadget at runtime.

      • getPathToSpec

        public String getPathToSpec()
        Description copied from interface: GadgetSpec
        Returns the path to the specification of the gadget. By default this is on the classpath, although overriding implementations could choose to load the spec from elsewhere.
        Specified by:
        getPathToSpec in interface GadgetSpec
        Returns:
        the path to the specification of the gadget

      • getGadgetResource

        public GadgetResource getGadgetResource()
        Description copied from interface: GadgetSpec
        Returns a GadgetResource of type text/xml that represents the XML specification of this OpenSocial gadget. This MUST NOT return null.
        Specified by:
        getGadgetResource in interface GadgetSpec
        Returns:
        a GadgetResource of type text/xml

      • getEEResource

        public GadgetResource getEEResource()
        Description copied from interface: GadgetSpec
        Returns a GadgetResource of type application/json that represents the EE data model used by this OpenSocial gadget. This can return null.
        Specified by:
        getEEResource in interface GadgetSpec
        Returns:
        a GadgetResource of type application/json or null if the gadget does not use EE

      • getCssResources

        public Map<String,GadgetResource> getCssResources()
        Description copied from interface: GadgetSpec
        Returns a Map of GadgetResource objects of type text/css that represents local CSS resources used by the gadget at runtime. This can return null.
        Specified by:
        getCssResources in interface GadgetSpec
        Returns:
        a Map of GadgetResource objects of type text/css or null if the gadget uses no local CSS resources
